#Block Catalog, Search and Accounts
Disallow: */account/create/*
Disallow: */customer/account/*
Disallow: */checkout/cart/*
Disallow: */catalogsearch/*
Disallow: /search/ajax/suggest*


#Superfluous market folders
Disallow: /fr/

Disallow: /de/
Disallow: /nl/

#Block Product Parameters
Disallow: *?brand
Disallow: *&brand
Disallow: *?cacao_percentage
Disallow: *&cacao_percentage
Disallow: *?type_of_chocolate
Disallow: *&type_of_chocolate
Disallow: *&format
Disallow: *?format
Disallow: *?flavours
Disallow: *&flavours
Disallow: *?gift_ideas

#Block Pagination above page 25
Disallow: *p=25
Disallow: *p=26
Disallow: *p=27

#Block ChatGPT
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

#Crawl Delay common
Crawl-delay: 86400
